verses.roman:
vṛṣa hañā kṛṣṇa-sane māthā-māthi raṇa
kabhu kṛṣṇa kare tāṅra pāda-saṁvāhana

synonyms: vṛṣa hañā—becoming a bull; kṛṣṇa-sane—with Kṛṣṇa; māthā-māthi raṇa—fighting head to head; kabhu—sometimes; kṛṣṇa—Kṛṣṇa; kare—does; tāṅra—His; pāda-saṁvāhana—massaging the feet.
translation: Playing like a bull, Lord Balarāma fights with Kṛṣṇa head to head. And sometimes Lord Kṛṣṇa massages the feet of Lord Balarāma.
